main event: An unidentified object was observed over Bethlehem, Connecticut on July 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was reported by multiple witnesses, including a retired USAF pilot.
The object was observed for approximately 15 minutes.
The object's altitude was estimated to be between 13,322 and 22,000 feet.
The weather conditions at the time included high thin clouds and rain.
Two young boys were also present and could corroborate the sighting.
witnesses: retired USAF pilot, two young boys
photographs: no photographs were included in the report
